headline: Europe Confronts the Silence: SAIX Director Tasked with Building a Sovereign Internet by 2030
body: The global network as we knew it has vanished. Following the total implementation of the 'Walls of Code' by the United States and China, the European Union has transitioned into a state of digital isolation. Today, the newly appointed Director of the Sovereign Artificial Intelligence eXchange (SAIX) begins a high-stakes five-year countdown to construct a fully independent infrastructure. Faced with a restricted budget and the urgent need for environmental sustainability, the project represents Europe's final stand for technological autonomy. Experts suggest that the new methodology for calculating data center environmental costs will be the defining factor in whether the SAIX initiative can survive this geopolitical winter. With the digital frontier closed, the mandate is clear: build or be left in the dark.
flavor: Neutral yet cinematic reportage on the end of the global digital era.
